item.description: FEBRUARY 29 (Friday) Singles HAPPY HOUR at Avon Old Farms Inn in Avon starting at 5 pm. We've been here many times and our visit has always been fantastic! A great place to come after work to start the weekend. As usual, they'll have delicious hors d'oeuvres for our pleasure. There is no charge. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I-84 Exit 39 Farmington (Rt. 4), turn right onto Rt. 10, go about 6 miles to Rt. 44, facility directly across the street.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at a table waiting to meet you.
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
